preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 48.0 g of Cobalt (Co). 
 2. Measure out 6.0 g of Lanthanum (La). 
 3. Measure out 6.0 g of Manganese (Mn). 
 4. Measure out 24.0 g of Phosphorus (P). 
 5. Measure out 16.0 g of Yttrium (Y). 
 6. Combine all ingredients in a clean, dry ceramic crucible. 
 7. Use a pestle and mortar to grind the mixture into a fine powder for uniformity.
